# GETMARKED: Reuse your quiz questions across a variety of learning platforms

GETMARKED provides a web application that helps teachers and schools reuse their quiz questions across a variety of learning platforms. Supported platforms include Canvas, Google Forms, Microsoft Forms, Moodle, Brightspace, Schoology, Blackboard, itslearning, Coursera, H5P.com, Adobe Captivate, LearnDash, Cypher LMS (fka NEO LMS), TalentLMS, Learn365 (fka LMS365), SLS, Sakai, Kahoot, Quizizz, Quizlet, Blooket, Gimkit, Wooclap, Socrative, Formative.com, Pear Assessment (fka Edulastic), Quizalize, StudyMate, Quia and EasyQuizy. GETMARKED also supports data formats like Word, PDF, QTI 1.2, QTI 2.1, QTI 2.2, GIFT, Moodle XML, AIKEN, IMSCC, TXT, CSV, Examview and WebCT.

Key terms: QTI, Moodle XML, Quiz, Test, Exams, Word, Word Converter, Import Quiz, Export Quiz, Download Quiz, Migrate Quiz, Quiz Converter, Exam Converter, Respondus Alternative, Quiz Creator, LTI.

## User Guide

- [User Guide](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/guide/): User guide for GETMARKED Digitaliser

## Blog Posts

- [GETMARKED Blog](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/): GETMARKED's blog, providing tutorials and guides on how to import and export quiz question across platforms and other thoughts about edtech.
- [QTI 2.1 Guide](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/complete-guide-to-qti/): A guide on the QTI 2.1 standard.
- [Convert Word Doc to Moodle Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/import-word-to-moodle/): A step-by-step guide on how to convert your word document quiz and exams into a Moodle quiz.
- [Convert Word Doc to Canvas Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/import-word-into-canvas-question-bank/): A step-by-step guide on how to convert your word document quiz and exams into a Canvas quiz.
- [Convert Word Doc to Google Form Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-quiz-from-google-doc-into-google-forms/): A step-by-step guide on how to convert your word document quiz and exams into a Google Form Quiz.
- [How to import QTI file into Brightspace LMS](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-file-into-brightspace/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into Brightspace question bank.
- [How to import QTI file into Canvas LMS](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-file-into-canvas/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into Canvas Quiz.
- [How to import QTI file into Canvas LMS](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-file-into-sakai/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into Sakai Quiz.
- [How to import QTI file into Cypher LMS](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-file-into-neo-lms/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into Cypher LMS Quiz (fka NEO LMS).
- [How to import QTI file into itslearning](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-into-itslearning/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into itslearning Quiz.
- [How to import QTI file into Schoology](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-qti-into-schoology/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a QTI file into Schoology Quiz.
- [Convert Moodle Quiz to Canvas Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/export-moodle-into-canvas-lms/): A step-by-step guide on how to convert your Moodle quiz and Canvas quiz.
- [Import Quiz into Blackboard](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-blackboard-test-and-pools-into-blackboard-ultra/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a Blackboard Pools zip file into Blackboard Ultra.
- [Export Quizizz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-quizizz-to-any-lms/): How to export Quizizz quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Quizlet for free](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-quizlet-flashcard-into-kahoot-quizizz-google-forms/): How to export Quizlet flashcard for free as quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Google Forms](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-google-form-quiz/): How to export Google Form quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Socrative](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-socrative-quiz/): How to export Socrative quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Kahoot](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-kahoot/): How to export Kahoot quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Gimkit](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-gimkit/): How to export Gimkit quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Blooket](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-blooket-quiz/): How to export Blooket quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export Canvas Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-canvas-quiz/): A step-by-step guide on how to export Canvas quiz questions.
- [Export Formative](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-go-formative-quiz/): A step-by-step guide on how to export questions from Formative.com.
- [Export Microsoft Forms](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-microsoft-forms/): A step-by-step guide on how to export Microsoft Forms to any other learning platforms.
- [Export Quizlet](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-quizlet-to-canvas-blackboard-moodle-brightspace-lms/): How to export Quizlet flashcard as quiz questions to any learning platform.
- [Export quizzes created by ChatGPT](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-generate-questions-in-chatgpt-and-export-to-canvas-blackboard-moodle-lms/): How to export quiz questions generated from ChatGPT to any learning platform.
- [Export Schoology Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-schoology-quiz-to-any-learning-platform/): A step-by-step guide on how to export Schoology quiz questions.
- [Export Brightspace Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-d2l-brightspace-quiz/): A step-by-step guide on how to export Brightspace quiz questions.
- [Export Quia Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-and-download-quia-quiz/): A step-by-step guide on how to export Quia quiz questions to any other learning platform.
- [Export itslearning Question Bank](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-export-itslearning-quiz-and-question-bank/): A step-by-step guide on how to export your itslearning question bank to any learning platform.
- [Import Pear Assessments](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-edulastic-quiz-from-any-learning-platform/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a Pear Assessment from any sources (e.g. Word) or learning platforms (e.g. Kahoot).
- [Import LearnDash Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-word-quiz-into-learndash/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a LearnDash quiz from any sources (e.g. Word) or learning platforms (e.g. Kahoot).
- [Import LearnDash Quiz](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-import-quiz-into-hp5dotcom-from-word-canvas-moodle-blackboard-kahoot-quizizz-and-more/): A step-by-step guide on how to import a Hp5.com quiz from any sources (e.g. Word) or learning platforms (e.g. Kahoot).
- [Fix Google Admin Policy Enforced Error](https://digitaliser.getmarked.ai/blog/how-to-google-forms-admin-policy-enforced/): A step-by-step guide on how to fix Google Admin Policy Enforced Error.
